Type Locality

Record numbers: Argentina : 20 , Chile : 4 , Uruguay : 4 ;
total: 28 .

Remarks: This species appears to have a Neotropic-Nearctic distribution (
McInnes 1994 a
), the single New Zealand and Japanese (
Utsugi 1988
, 1992 ) records are probably misidentifications.
